title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height doesn't change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Observe that the label's height remains the same.

Expected behavior: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height should adjust accordingly to justify the font size.
OB: The label's height does not change when the font size is modified.
EB: The label's height should adjust to justify the font size when it is modified.
SR:
1. Create a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label.
3. Verify that the label's height changes to accommodate the new font size.
